translation.zh: 我说：“这件事你是最合适的人选我希望你接受”

translation.zh: 我知道布什总统见过他我想 对他的评价还很高

translation.zh: 所以 大家都同意

translation.zh: 他将是最佳人选 如果他接受这个任务的话

translation.zh: 他不想接受伊拉克的工作

translation.zh: 可是那个礼拜 他打来电话说

translation.zh: 他刚接到纽约来电

translation.zh: 联合国秘书长要见他

translation.zh: 我问他：“见你谈什么？伊拉克吗？

translation.zh: 很显然 他有兴趣了

translation.zh: 他去了伊拉克 随行的

translation.zh: 有宪法、选举、警察事务、难民事务方面的专家

translation.zh: 他对成功的定义 就是尽快结束占领

translation.zh: 和平顺利地向一个

translation.zh: 光明、独立的后萨达姆时代过渡

translation.en: We see our role as one that supports the Iraqis to replace
translation.zh: 我们的任务 就是帮助伊拉克人

translation.zh: 尽快取代盟军的工作

translation.zh: 恢复完整的主权

translation.en: No one likes to be under occupation.
translation.zh: 没人喜欢被占领

translation.zh: 我们直接去了联盟临时管理当局总部

translation.zh: “安全形势有所改善

translation.zh: 我们到得早了

translation.zh: 招呼客人落座

translation.zh: 醒来时 我倒在房间另一头

translation.en: Minutes ago, an explosion ripped through a hotel in central Baghdad,
translation.zh: 几分钟前 巴格达市中心一家酒店发生爆炸

translation.en: the headquarters for the UN. An update live...
translation.zh: 那里是联合国总部 现场报道…

translation.en: [reporter 1] ...by far the most serious attack that's been,
translation.zh: 这是美军进驻巴格达以来

translation.en: since US troops took Baghdad.
translation.zh: 最严重的一次袭击

translation.en: [reporter 2] First this hour, terrorism in Baghdad.
translation.zh: 本时段头条 巴格达恐袭

translation.en: Right now at least 14 people are dead, dozens wounded...
translation.zh: 现在至少已有14人丧生 数十人受伤

translation.en: [reporter 3] A bomb exploded directly below
translation.zh: 一枚炸弹在特别代表塞尔吉奥德梅洛

translation.en: the office of its special representative here, Sérgio de Mello.
translation.zh: 办公室的正下方爆炸

translation.en: The UN has been there in what used to be the Canal Hotel since the early 1990s.
translation.zh: 自从90年代初 联合国总部就设在这座运河酒店

translation.en: Three hundred UN staff work inside.
translation.zh: 300名联合国职员在这里办公

translation.en: It's home to several UN humanitarian agencies,
translation.zh: 几个联合国人道救援机构也在这里

translation.en: all working on the rebuilding of Iraq.
translation.zh: 都是来参与伊拉克重建的

translation.en: I entered and saw Buenaventura,
translation.zh: 我进来 看见博纳万图拉

translation.en: the assistant,
translation.zh: 他是助理

translation.en: he was dead.
translation.zh: 他死了

translation.en: I entered Jonathan's office,
translation.zh: 我走进乔纳森的办公室

translation.en: Rick was there,
translation.zh: 里克在那儿

translation.en: also dead.
translation.zh: 也死了

translation.en: And after Jonathan's office,
translation.zh: 乔纳森的办公室之后

translation.en: emptiness.
translation.zh: 一片空旷

translation.en: No office.
translation.zh: 没有办公室了

translation.en: I called, "Sérgio! Sérgio!"
translation.zh: 我喊 “塞尔吉奥！塞尔吉奥！”

translation.en: No response.
translation.zh: 没人应答

translation.en: I went outside the building
translation.zh: 我来到大楼外

translation.en: and I climbed around it.
translation.zh: 从废墟边上爬过去

translation.en: I climbed on top of the rubble
translation.zh: 爬到废墟顶上

translation.en: to try to find Sérgio.
translation.zh: 找塞尔吉奥

translation.en: And with me, there was an Australian,
translation.zh: 和我一起的还有一个澳大利亚人

translation.en: Jeff, the military attaché for Sérgio.
translation.zh: 杰夫 塞尔吉奥的驻外武官

translation.en: [in English] I was calling out, stopping, listening.
translation.zh: 我一边喊 一边听 时而停下来

translation.en: Move a meter, call out, stop, listen.
translation.zh: 前进一米 喊几声 停下来 听听

translation.en: There was this other fellow who was running towards the rubble,
translation.zh: 还有一个人朝着废墟跑来

translation.en: who was in US military uniform.
translation.zh: 穿着联合国的军装

translation.en: I said, "Who are you?" And he said, "My name's Bill."
translation.zh: 我说：“你是谁？”他说：“我叫比尔”

translation.en: The gentleman in a blue UN baseball cap came up and he said,
translation.zh: 一个戴着蓝色联合国棒球帽的人过来他说

translation.en: something to the effect of like, "Where are the rest of your guys?"
translation.zh: 大意是说：“你们其他人呢？”

translation.en: And I said, "There are no rest of our guys,
translation.zh: 我说：“没有其他人了

translation.en: it's me and a captain right now."
translation.zh: 现在只有我和一名上尉”

translation.en: I want to go in the building and do an internal reconnaissance and see.
translation.zh: 我想进入大楼 侦察一下情况

translation.en: I must be nuts to even think about going in the building.
translation.zh: 我一定是疯了 居然会想进入大楼

translation.en: But firefighters have this thing, we run into burning buildings
translation.zh: 但消防员就是这样我们就是要闯进着火的建筑

translation.en: when everybody else is running out of burning buildings.
translation.zh: 别人往外跑 我们往里跑

translation.en: We made our way upstairs and it was almost unrecognizable.
translation.zh: 我们往楼上跑 里面已经面目全非

translation.en: I'd been up there on many occasions, for meetings...
translation.zh: 这里我来过多次 来开会…

translation.en: As we walked along, I was looking
translation.zh: 我们一边往前走 一边找

translation.en: and at one point I found a little spot of light down below.
translation.zh: 忽然脚下出现一点亮光

translation.en: If you looked in there, I could see two people.
translation.zh: 往里面一看 看见两个人

translation.en: [Loescher] The flash is what I remember.
translation.zh: 我记得一道闪光

translation.en: The ceiling collapsed, the floor collapsed.
translation.zh: 天花板掉下来了 地板塌了

translation.en: We were thrust down.
translation.zh: 我们往下掉

translation.en: I heard someone say, "Oh, shit!"
translation.zh: 我听见有人说：“我靠！”

translation.en: As if someone had expected it.
translation.zh: 好像有心理准备似的

translation.en: I'm pretty sure it was Sérgio.
translation.zh: 我基本可以确定那是塞尔吉奥

translation.en: The next thing I remember is regaining consciousness
translation.zh: 接下来我仍有记忆的事就是我苏醒过来

translation.en: and not being able to move.
translation.zh: 动弹不得

translation.en: I remember looking up, um...
translation.zh: 我抬头往上看

translation.en: at, at someone...
translation.zh: 看见一个人

translation.en: who was wearing a...
translation.zh: 他戴着…

translation.en: like a fireman's hat or, or helmet,
translation.zh: 像是消防员的帽子 或者是头盔

translation.en: and, and I sort of waved at him.
translation.zh: 我朝他挥手

translation.en: It may sound melodramatic, but honestly from looking at it
translation.zh: 现在听起来可能有点夸张但当时的情况

translation.en: I was pretty convinced that this was gonna be a one-way trip. Um...
translation.zh: 我觉得我可能不能活着回家了

translation.en: You know, I'd seen Oklahoma City done enough collapse-rescue stuff,
translation.zh: 我见过俄克拉荷马城炸弹袭击现场做过很多大楼坍塌救援工作

translation.en: and the building, it was still moving.
translation.zh: 大楼还在晃动

translation.en: Uh, you know, bricks were still falling,
translation.zh: 砖头还在往下掉

translation.en: it was, you know, within a few minutes of the blast.
translation.zh: 爆炸过后才几分钟

translation.en: I was kind of convinced this was a one-way trip,
translation.zh: 我觉得我不能活着回去了

translation.en: and I said, you know, "Tell my wife and, uh, my daughter I love them."
translation.zh: 我说：“告诉我妻子和我女儿我爱她们”

translation.en: I took my body armor off and started to climb down the hole.
translation.zh: 我把防护服脱掉 顺着洞口往里爬

translation.en: I got down to about... [sighs] where the first floor would be.
translation.zh: 我下到原来一楼的位置

translation.en: At that point I had to turn around in a space
translation.zh: 然后 我必须转过身

translation.en: and basically slide down head first, so I could get next to him.
translation.zh: 头朝下往下滑 才能到他所在的位置

translation.en: And fortunately there was a piece of reinforcing rod, a rebar,
translation.zh: 很幸运 那有一段钢筋

translation.en: that was sticking out of a concrete and I put my shoulder up against that.
translation.zh: 从水泥里伸出来 我用肩膀顶住那里

translation.en: It was perfect, where I could basically lean down
translation.zh: 正合适 我可以探身下去

translation.en: and, you know, touch them.
translation.zh: 摸到他们

translation.en: Um, and that's when I first introduced myself when I said,
translation.zh: 我自我介绍 说：

translation.en: you know, "My name is Bill. I'm a civilian EMT. I'm from the army unit.
translation.zh: “我叫比尔 我是救援抢险队的隶属于陆军

translation.en: I promise I'm gonna get you guys out of here alive."
translation.zh: 我保证把你们活着救出来”

translation.en: I remember saying my name to that person.
translation.zh: 我记得我对他报了名字

translation.en: Telling him that my name was Gil.
translation.zh: 告诉他我叫吉尔

translation.en: I remember very little else.
translation.zh: 其他都不记得了

translation.en: One gentleman said "My name is Gil," and he was directly in front of me.
translation.zh: 其中一个人说：“我叫吉尔”他在我正前方

translation.en: There was another gentleman, and he said his name was Sérgio.
translation.zh: 还有一个人 他说他叫塞尔吉奥

translation.en: As we're talking, you know, he starts to say, I thought he initially said,
translation.zh: 我们就这样简单交流着 他说我记得他开口说：

translation.en: "Don't pull me out." And I said, "Don't worry. We're gonna get you both out.
translation.zh: “别让我走” 我说：“别担心 我们会把你们俩都救出去

translation.en: I promise we'll get you both out."
translation.zh: 我保证 我们会把你们俩救出去”

translation.en: And he goes, "No, no. Don't let them pull the mission out."
translation.zh: 他说：“不 别让他们撤走代表团”

translation.en: And at this point, I'm still not sure who he is.
translation.zh: 这时候 我还是不确定他是谁

translation.en: Then he's asking about, you know, the other people.
translation.zh: 然后他开始询问其他人

translation.en: "How many people are killed? How many people are wounded?
translation.zh: “多少人死亡？多少人受伤？

translation.en: Do we know what happened?"
translation.zh: 知道出什么事了吗？”

translation.en: And suddenly I'm dawning, this guy's somebody who's, you know, in charge.
translation.zh: 我突然明白过来 这个人是个负责人

translation.en: It's not just a worker, he's asking questions as the guy in charge.
translation.zh: 不是一般员工他问的都是负责人的问题

translation.en: And it dawned on me, "Jesus, this is Sérgio de Mello."
translation.zh: 我明白了“天呐 他是塞尔吉奥德梅洛”

translation.en: He had such perfect teeth.
translation.zh: 他的牙齿整齐

translation.en: He was a happy boy, always laughing,
translation.zh: 小时候是个快乐的男孩 总是爱笑

translation.en: always in a good mood.
translation.zh: 总是很开朗

translation.en: People would ask him to sing everywhere.
translation.zh: 走到哪儿 人们都让他唱歌

translation.en: When he was about three years old
translation.zh: 三岁时

translation.en: he could sing in four languages.
translation.zh: 他能用四种语言唱歌

translation.en: We moved to Italy.
translation.zh: 我们搬到意大利

translation.en: There he attended a Catholic school.
translation.zh: 在那儿 他上了一所天主教学校

translation.en: [Power in English] Sérgio was the son of a Brazilian diplomat,
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥的父亲是一位巴西外交官

translation.en: so he spent most of his childhood years abroad, in Europe, mainly.
translation.zh: 所以童年大部分时间在国外主要是在欧洲

translation.en: In Genoa, in Milan, in Rome,
translation.zh: 热那亚、米兰、罗马

translation.en: uh, Naples, and even in Beirut.
translation.zh: 那不勒斯 甚至贝鲁特

translation.en: Through that vagabond life, this was just second nature to him.
translation.zh: 这种四海为家的生活塑造了他的性格

translation.en: His capacity to just descend into a new place and look around and say,
translation.zh: 他能够刚到一个陌生环境 四周看看就说：

translation.en: "Okay, I'm home."
translation.zh: “好 这就是我家了”

translation.en: And then finally he went to a French school
translation.zh: 最后 他上了一所法国学校

translation.en: at the Sorbonne
translation.zh: 在索邦

translation.en: where he studied philosophy.
translation.zh: 攻读哲学

translation.en: [Power in English] He became activated politically,
translation.zh: 他开始在政治上活跃起来

translation.en: partly by the philosophy, and mainly by what was going on
translation.zh: 部分是因为哲学的影响 部分是因为

translation.en: on the campus of the Sorbonne at that time.
translation.zh: 当时索邦大学里的学生运动

translation.en: It was 1968, war in Vietnam was raging,
translation.zh: 1968年 越南战事正烈

translation.en: um, students and workers throughout France were striking.
translation.zh: 法国全国学生罢课 工人罢工

translation.en: And of course in May of '68,
the students ended up affectively taking over the campus.
translation.zh: 学生基本占领了校园

translation.en: Sérgio manned the barricades, threw stones at the police.
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥把守路障 朝警察投掷石块

translation.en: What's amazing about his politics in those days is,
translation.zh: 那时候 他的政治信仰

translation.en: how dogmatic he is,
translation.zh: 十分笃定

translation.en: how virulent his anti-Americanism, his anti-imperialism,
translation.zh: 极端反美 反帝国主义

translation.en: even his Marxism or Neo-Marxism is.
translation.zh: 他所信仰的马克思主义或者说新马克思主义也是极端的

translation.en: I mean, he is a revolutionary to the core.
translation.zh: 他是个不折不扣的革命者

translation.en: He graduated from the Sorbonne in 1969.
translation.zh: 1969年 他从索邦大学毕业

translation.en: One of his best friends lived in Geneva,
translation.zh: 他有个好朋友住在日内瓦

translation.en: and Sérgio, looking for work, went and crashed at his place.
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥去找工作 就住在朋友家

translation.en: Got some interviews with international organizations,
translation.zh: 在几个国际组织面试

translation.en: and ended up at the UN High Commissioner for Refugees.
translation.zh: 进入了联合国难民事务高级专员办公室

translation.en: [McNamara] Those of us who joined in the '70s really worked on Third World issues.
translation.zh: 我们70年代进来的这些人都是在处理第三世界问题

translation.en: It was well regarded,
translation.zh: 这份工作受人尊重

translation.en: it was expanding rapidly,
translation.zh: 业务扩大很快

translation.en: it had an interesting mandate of not just aid, but also protection,
translation.zh: 它的使命不只是援助 还有保护

translation.en: it was politically very active in the sense,
translation.zh: 政治上很活跃

translation.en: that it was on hot borders and conflict areas.
translation.zh: 总是去冲突地区和出事的边境地带

translation.en: The turning point of Sérgio's relationship to his new place of employment
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥和他的新工作单位之间关系的转折

translation.en: was his first field mission,
translation.zh: 是他第一次外派

translation.en: uh, which was in Bangladesh.
translation.zh: 去孟加拉国

translation.en: Here Sérgio is tasked as a very young man to help provide shelter,
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥当时很年轻负责提供庇护所

translation.en: to help provide food, um, to try to come up with some kind of political strategy
translation.zh: 提供食品 提出帮助难民重返家园的

translation.en: by which these people could eventually return to their homes.
translation.zh: 政治方案

translation.en: He discovered himself.
translation.zh: 他发现了自我

translation.en: He suddenly saw extreme poverty, enormous refugee flows,
translation.zh: 突然看到那种极端贫困的景象看到大批难民潮

translation.en: and the ideals that had motivated him took life, they took flesh.
translation.zh: 那些推动他的理念顿时有了生命鲜活起来

translation.en: He realized that he was not merely a man of thought,
translation.zh: 他意识到 他不只是个思考者

translation.en: but that if he wanted to make those ideals real,
translation.zh: 要让理念变为现实

translation.en: he had to be a man of action.
translation.zh: 他必须是个行动者

translation.en: [McNamara] I met Sérgio first time actually in Swaziland in 1976,
translation.zh: 我第一次见到塞尔吉奥是1976年在斯威士兰

translation.en: to move the Soweto kids who'd been attacked by the South African police,
translation.zh: 帮助被南非警察迫害的索韦托儿童

translation.en: out of Swaziland to Tanzania.
translation.zh: 从斯威士兰转移到坦桑尼亚

translation.en: This was a very hot operation, as you can imagine
translation.zh: 可以想象 这是一次很危险的行动

translation.en: the South African security were all over the place,
translation.zh: 到处都是南非警察

translation.en: but we evacuated them through Mozambique.
translation.zh: 但我们通过莫桑比克成功转移

translation.en: Sérgio was the acting UNHCR person in Maputo.
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥是联合国难民署在马普托的负责人

translation.en: [Richard Holbrooke] I met Sérgio Vieira de Mello in Cambodia and Thailand
translation.zh: 我是在柬埔寨和泰国认识塞尔吉奥的

translation.en: when the Khmer Rouge were driven out of power
translation.zh: 红色高棉垮台后

translation.en: and a massive refugee crisis ensued.
translation.zh: 爆发了大规模难民危机

translation.en: This is what brought a whole generation of people
translation.zh: 整整一代人投入了

translation.en: into the international humanitarian effort.
translation.zh: 国际人道主义救援工作

translation.en: You're a better agronomist than I am.
translation.zh: 你摆弄花草树木比我在行

translation.en: [grunts] Voilà.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [Holbrooke] Sérgio was the most dazzling, charismatic person in that area.
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥是那里最有个人魅力的一个

translation.en: [Sérgio] I better not shower him.
translation.zh: 最好别给他淋浴

translation.en: [Holbrooke] How could a guy this charismatic, this good looking,
translation.zh: 一个这么有魅力 这么帅的人

translation.en: be doing this kind of work?
translation.zh: 怎么会做这种工作

translation.en: Well, he was one of the bright stars, no question.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 他是一颗明星

translation.en: Probably, maybe, the brightest.
translation.zh: 可能是最亮的那一颗

translation.en: He was the master magician,
translation.zh: 他是魔术大师

translation.en: mediator, manager, massager of egos.
translation.zh: 是调解人、管理者善于让人感觉良好

translation.en: [reporter] Would you mind spelling your last name?
translation.zh: 你的姓氏怎么拼写？

translation.en: [chuckles] V-I-E-I-R-A D-E M-E-L-L-O.
translation.zh: V-I-E-I-R-A  D-E M-E-L-L-O

translation.en: The mission was to return between 350 and 400,000 refugees
translation.zh: 我们的任务是让三十五万到四十万难民回家

translation.en: who were primarily living on the borders with Thailand in refugee camps
translation.zh: 他们基本都住在泰国边境的难民营

translation.en: for a prolonged period of time already
translation.zh: 已经住了很久了

translation.en: to return them ahead of the elections that were scheduled to take place.
translation.zh: 要在计划中的选举开始前帮他们重返家园

translation.en: Sérgio was convinced that the only way to make the repatriation a success
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥相信 成功实现难民还乡的唯一办法

translation.en: was to work with the Khmer Rouge.
translation.zh: 是和红色高棉合作

translation.en: But this was controversial because...
translation.zh: 但这很有争议 因为…

translation.en: they were what they were. They, they...
translation.zh: 他们是红色高棉 他们…

translation.en: Their senior leadership had been part of a genocidal regime.
translation.zh: 他们的高层领导人曾经建立了一个血腥政权 大肆屠杀

translation.en: [McNamara] He had a long fascination with evil genius.
translation.zh: 他一直对邪恶天才抱有浓厚的兴趣

translation.en: The mind of evil men and how they functioned and why.
translation.zh: 大奸大恶之人都是怎么想的 为什么

translation.en: Especially intellectual evil, as the Khmer Rouge were.
translation.zh: 特别是智力上的邪恶 比如红色高棉

translation.en: There was no question it was high risk and it shouldn't have happened.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问风险是很高的 本不该发生

translation.en: It was all done, um, in a bit of a...
translation.zh: 完全是以一种

translation.en: an unorthodox way.
translation.zh: 非传统的方式实现的

translation.en: There was a meeting place which was in the middle of nowhere.
translation.zh: 在一片荒无人迹的地方有个会面地点

translation.en: We had no idea where we were going.
translation.zh: 我们不知道要去哪儿

translation.en: I remember Sérgio's driver declared him, basically, insane.
translation.zh: 我记得塞尔吉奥的司机说他简直是疯了

translation.en: We had to walk through minefields.
translation.zh: 我们得走过雷区

translation.en: There was no radio contact.
translation.zh: 没有无线电联络

translation.en: And it was an hour and a half by tractor trailer
translation.zh: 坐上拖拉机还要再走一个半小时

translation.en: to a miniscule kind of settlement headquarters.
translation.zh: 才到一个袖珍型的据点

translation.en: We spent the rest of the day there and evening and had discussions with them
translation.zh: 当天剩下的时间我们和他们展开讨论直到晚上

translation.en: about the land and where people could return.
translation.zh: 我们讨论土地问题和难民安置

translation.en: It was just an extraordinary experience.
translation.zh: 那真是一段不平凡的经历

translation.en: Sérgio never underestimated, of course, who he was dealing with
translation.zh: 当然 塞尔吉奥丝毫没有低估他的谈判对手

translation.en: and what their, their historical baggage was,
translation.zh: 没有忽视这些人的历史问题

translation.en: but that did not cause him to think that he shouldn't talk to them.
translation.zh: 但这并不妨碍他与他们对话

translation.en: He wasn't a black or white kind of guy.
translation.zh: 他不是那种非黑即白的人

translation.en: [McNamara] War Criminals, My Friends
translation.zh: 《战犯 朋友》

translation.zh: 他的自传可以起这个名字

translation.zh: 他的视角比我们多数人更宽广

translation.zh: 如果是我 我会更教条主义地

translation.en: human rights approach that these guys were war criminals
translation.zh: 坚持人权原则认定这些人犯有战争罪

translation.zh: 应该被立即送上法庭

translation.zh: 他让我稍安勿躁 别太清高

translation.zh: 我觉得 那是一种突破

translation.zh: 那是联合国

translation.zh: 也可以说是外国人第一次

translation.zh: 和红色高棉官方进行接触

translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥至少说服了部分红色高棉的高层

translation.zh: 让他们认识到 与国际社会合作

translation.zh: 是一条更有建设性的路

translation.zh: 比搞破坏更符合他们的自身利益

translation.zh: 在实际问题上 他促成了一次难得的切实的成功

translation.en: of a long international
translation.zh: 国际社会在柬埔寨

translation.en: and a very expensive international engagement in Cambodia...
translation.zh: 长期且耗资巨大的努力有了成果

translation.en: the return of 400,000 Cambodians to their homes.
translation.zh: 四十万柬埔寨人得以重返家园

translation.en: [Bos] I think there was a huge sense of being vindicated.
translation.zh: 有种被证明自己正确的感觉

translation.en: I think you can almost see a sense of satisfaction on his face
translation.zh: 你甚至能在他脸上看到一丝满意的神色

translation.en: that they're able to take their destiny in their own hands.
translation.zh: 满意于他们能掌握自己的命运了

translation.en: May they be blessed with happiness, lasting peace, and prosperity.
translation.zh: 愿他们得享幸福、持久的和平与繁荣

translation.en: We are all here betting on peace.
translation.zh: 我们都在这里 祈祷和平

translation.en: We will, as from this morning,
translation.zh: 从今天早上开始 怀着不平静的心情

translation.en: and with deep emotion, escort you home.
translation.zh: 我们将护送你们回家

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: From that point forward, he wasn't just a UN success story,
translation.zh: 从那一刻起 他不再只是个联合国的成功故事

translation.zh: 或人道主义救援的成功故事

translation.en: he was an individual that governments thought about as a problem solver,
translation.zh: 他成了政府眼中能够解决问题的那个人

translation.en: as a troubleshooter, as a go-to guy.
translation.zh: 一个排难解纷的人一个遇到事情可以指望的人

translation.en: As someone that you could put into harm's way,
translation.zh: 你可以派他去冒着风险

translation.en: have talk to the world's most dangerous people,
translation.zh: 和世界上最危险的人物谈判

translation.en: and he could somehow pull rabbits out of the hat.
translation.zh: 而他会不辱使命 创造奇迹

translation.en: I already looked at him like 007.
translation.zh: 我看他就像007

translation.en: He never dies.
translation.zh: 他从不会死

translation.en: I asked him one time, "Sérgio,
translation.zh: 有一次我问他：“塞尔吉奥

translation.en: why do you go to all these countries,
translation.zh: 你为什么要去那些国家

translation.en: that have such conflicts, that are so dangerous?"
translation.zh: 那些爆发冲突 充满危险的地方？”

translation.en: He just laughed
translation.zh: 他只是笑

translation.en: and didn't reply.
translation.zh: 没有回答

translation.en: [Vance Kuhner] It sounded to me like a 500-pound bomb
translation.zh: 听声音像是226公斤炸弹

translation.en: had gone off, and very close.
translation.zh: 爆炸了 而且很近

translation.en: I went down on one knee
translation.zh: 我单膝跪下

translation.en: and when I stood back up again, I looked at my first sergeant and I said,
translation.zh: 重新站起来后我看看我的一等士官 说：

translation.en: "Let's go. Let's get in the truck."
translation.zh: “走 快上车”

translation.en: My driver said, "Where to go?" I said, "You see the smoke?
translation.zh: 我的司机说：“去哪儿？”我说：“看见黑烟了吗？

translation.en: Follow the smoke."
translation.zh: 往那儿走”

translation.en: My philosophy of the UN was not 100%.
translation.zh: 我对联合国的理念不是百分之百的

translation.en: The UN believes a lot of talking will solve all the problems,
translation.zh: 联合国相信开展好多对话能解决所有问题

translation.en: and they don't.
translation.zh: 其实不能

translation.en: Sometimes you need to have brute force.
translation.zh: 有时候 你需要武力

translation.en: On that day it didn't make any difference.
translation.zh: 那天 它没有起到任何作用

translation.en: There were people there that needed our help,
translation.zh: 人们需要我们救助

translation.en: and my job was to accomplish that.
translation.zh: 我的职责是提供救助

translation.en: [Kuhner] I wasn't prepared for what I'd saw.
translation.zh: 我目睹的场景是我始料未及的

translation.en: Mass chaos.
translation.zh: 乱作一团

translation.en: Wounded people everywhere.
translation.zh: 到处是伤员

translation.en: I saw one man, he had a piece of rebar that was stuck through his cheeks
translation.zh: 我看见一个人 两腮被钢筋贯穿

translation.en: and he was sitting there smoking a cigarette.
translation.zh: 他还坐在那里抽烟

translation.en: Absolute insanity.
translation.zh: 简直疯了

translation.en: Time was our enemy.
translation.zh: 我们和时间赛跑

translation.en: We needed to start moving people.
translation.zh: 我们得转移伤员

translation.en: [Valentine] It looked like a car bomb came in
translation.zh: 好像有人引爆了

translation.en: and it was setting off all the other vehicles that were next to it.
translation.zh: 一枚汽车炸弹周围的汽车也跟着爆炸了

translation.en: We had people that were crawling out of the building.
translation.zh: 有人从大楼里爬出来

translation.en: So I said, "Okay, I'll take control of this."
translation.zh: 我说：“好 我来控制局面”

translation.en: This little section, this little island,
translation.zh: 这一小片区域 这座小岛

translation.en: dirt island is gonna be our triage and staging area right now.
translation.zh: 这座土堆 现在就是我们的分诊台和集合点

translation.en: We had to make decisions on who was gonna live and who was gonna die.
translation.zh: 我们不得不决定 谁能活 谁会死

translation.en: [William] One of the things we have in civilian medical world
translation.zh: 在民用医疗界 我们有个概念

translation.en: is called the "Golden Hour."
translation.zh: 叫“黄金一小时”

translation.en: Basically if you can get somebody to the trauma center
translation.zh: 如果60分钟内能把伤员

translation.en: within 60 minutes from injury,
translation.zh: 送去急救中心抢救

translation.en: if you can get him there alive, they have a pretty good chance of surviving.
translation.zh: 如果能活着赶到生存的机会就比较大

translation.en: At least in the Western world.
translation.zh: 至少在西方国家如此

translation.en: At this point, I don't hear anybody calling,
translation.zh: 这时候 我听不见有人呼叫

translation.en: it's just a quiet little womb in there,
translation.zh: 黑暗中一片沉寂

translation.en: it's hotter than you know what.
translation.zh: 闷热得要命

translation.en: Both men were covered in brick and debris from the waist down.
translation.zh: 两个人腰部以下都埋在砖头瓦砾中

translation.en: Sérgio was actually more almost chest high.
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥埋得更深 几乎到胸部

translation.en: You couldn't see that anything was broken or out of place,
translation.zh: 看不见哪里断了或者炸飞了

translation.en: but he was covered completely.
translation.zh: 整个人被埋着

translation.en: They both had severe lower extremity injuries.
translation.zh: 两个人下肢都严重受伤

translation.en: Gil, you could see, his left leg was folded up.
translation.zh: 可以看见 吉尔的左腿是蜷曲着的

translation.en: Uh, Sérgio, we presumed he's got that much weight on him, he's got crush injuries.
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥 他受到那样的重压一定有挤压伤

translation.en: I was able to start an IV on Gil Loescher.
translation.zh: 我开始给吉尔洛舍输液

translation.en: I could not get to Sérgio de Mello well enough to get an IV going.
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥离我太远无法立即给他输液

translation.en: I just physically couldn't get in there without lying on top of Gil.
translation.zh: 不从吉尔身上爬过去 就够不着他

translation.en: I knew we had no heavy equipment,
translation.zh: 我知道 我们没有重型设备

translation.en: so I knew the only way we're gonna get these guys out is the old-fashioned way
translation.zh: 要把他们救出来 只有用老办法

translation.en: so I started taking bricks, you know, a couple of bricks at a time,
translation.zh: 所以我开始搬砖 一次搬一两块

translation.en: throwing them up in the opening,
translation.zh: 把砖头扔出洞口

translation.en: go back down, get a couple more bricks
translation.zh: 再下去 再搬两块

translation.en: and just, to try to get these guys uncovered.
translation.zh: 一点一点地把他们挖出来

translation.en: [Valentine] We saw about 185 people,
translation.zh: 我们看到大约185人

translation.en: and we moved 130 of them in 55 minutes in whatever vehicle we could find,
translation.zh: 在55分钟内 我们用能找到的各种车辆运走了130人

translation.en: uh, Deuce and a Half, 5 tons, pick-up trucks.
translation.zh: 载重卡车、五吨卡车、皮卡都用上了

translation.en: [Kuhner] MPU's were arriving at this point
translation.zh: 这时 陆军警察赶到了

translation.en: and they've set up a 360 degree security perimeter on the outside.
translation.zh: 在外围布置了360度警戒线

translation.en: Sorry, I need you to back up.
translation.zh: 抱歉 你们需要后退

translation.en: We then set to work searching the building and looking for survivors.
translation.zh: 然后 我们开始在大楼里搜寻幸存者

translation.en: [Valentine] Probably about an hour or so down the line,
translation.zh: 大概过了一个小时

translation.en: I heard a cry that there's more people up here.
translation.zh: 我听到有人喊 上边还有更多人

translation.en: So I said, "Okay, I'm going upstairs to check."
translation.zh: 我说：“好 我上楼看看”

translation.en: I went floor to floor, room to room
translation.zh: 我一层一层 一个房间一个房间地找

translation.en: till I got to the top floor and I heard another cry there,
translation.zh: 一直找到顶层 在那里我又听见有人喊

translation.en: and that's where I met Bill.
translation.zh: 我在那儿遇见了比尔

translation.en: About 40 minutes after I arrived, I hear somebody yelling from up above,
translation.zh: 我到那里大约40分钟后听见上面有人喊

translation.en: and the guy goes, "Do you need any help?"
translation.zh: 那人说：“你需要帮助吗？”

translation.en: And the last thing I wanted was somebody wo had no training down there,
translation.zh: 我不希望没有接受过训练的人在场

translation.en: gonna make more problem, knock more bricks down,
translation.zh: 会添乱 碰掉更多砖头

translation.en: and I said, "You have any experience?"
translation.zh: 我问：“你有经验吗？”

translation.en: and he said "I'm a New York City firefighter paramedic,"
translation.zh: 他说：“我是纽约市消防急救员”

translation.en: and I said, "Come on down."
translation.zh: 我说：“快下来吧”

translation.en: [Valentine] I looked at the hole
translation.zh: 我看到那个洞

translation.en: and I just said "Holy crap!"
translation.zh: 说：“老天呐！”

translation.en: Here would be the third floor...
translation.zh: 这里是三楼

translation.en: looking at it from the side.
translation.zh: 从侧面看

translation.en: When it collapsed, the roof basically went...
translation.zh: 坍塌时 房顶就这样了…

translation.en: And Sérgio's office would've been somewhere... in here.
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥的办公室大概在…这里

translation.en: The second floor had collapsed partially down.
translation.zh: 二楼地板部分坍塌了

translation.en: They were basically here. Their heads were down.
translation.zh: 他们大概在这个位置 头朝下

translation.en: Now, they would be next to each other. So this would, let's say, be Gil Loescher
translation.zh: 两个人紧挨着 好比这个是吉尔洛舍

translation.en: here in his feet...
translation.zh: 这是他的脚

translation.en: To his right behind him, on that diagram,
translation.zh: 他右侧 从图上看就是他后面

translation.en: Sérgio would be basically in the same position.
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥基本也是同样的姿势

translation.en: Several bodies were actually located in this area, over here.
translation.zh: 这里发现了几具尸体

translation.en: That were, the other people that were in the meeting.
translation.zh: 他们是参加会议的人

translation.en: We treat everybody in the EMS the same.
translation.zh: 在紧急救援中我们对所有人同等对待

translation.en: If I could have gotten Sérgio out first, would I?
translation.zh: 如果我能首先把塞尔吉奥救出来我会先救他吗？

translation.en: All things being equal, maybe.
translation.zh: 同等条件下 也许会

translation.en: But if it could have been the President of United States
translation.zh: 但哪怕是美国总统

translation.en: and I would've had to get Gil Loescher out first
translation.zh: 我也得先把吉尔洛舍救出来

translation.en: physically to get room to pull Sérgio out.
translation.zh: 才有空间营救塞尔吉奥

translation.en: I said "Let me go down, you've already gone your turn."
translation.zh: 我说：“我下去 你已经下去过了”

translation.en: My little one-man hole in the ground became a two-man hole in the ground,
translation.zh: 我那个仅容一人的地洞变成了容纳两人的地洞

translation.en: and we spent the next, uh, two, three hours working together like a team,
translation.zh: 接下来的两三个小时 我们分工合作

translation.en: uh, trying to get these guys out of there.
translation.zh: 努力把他们救上来

translation.en: [Valentine] I had to climb over two victims. First victim was a female.
translation.zh: 我得从两个受害人身上爬过去第一个是女性

translation.en: She had, uh, this side of the face covered with a concrete slab.
translation.zh: 她这半边脸被一块水泥板盖着

translation.en: Uh, she had what we call agonal breaths, but still had a pulse.
translation.zh: 只有呼吸反射 但还有脉搏

translation.en: She had a real severe head injury, I knew she wasn't gonna be survivable.
translation.zh: 她头部受到重伤 我知道无法抢救了

translation.en: I told her to hang on and I said "Keep your faith,
translation.zh: 我对她说坚强些 “坚持你的信仰

translation.en: and I said that God is with you," and she squeezed my hand.
translation.zh: 上帝与你同在” 她抓住了我的手

translation.en: So I'm assuming, because in the medical community
translation.zh: 在医疗界 我们认为

translation.en: the last thing that goes is your hearing,
translation.zh: 人最后失去的是听觉

translation.en: so I really believe the lady heard me.
translation.zh: 所以我相信那位女士听见了

translation.en: I quietly pray, and I tell him "Jesus loves you."
translation.zh: 我静静地祈祷 我说：“耶稣爱你”

translation.en: I do that automatically.
translation.zh: 对于我 这是本能的反应

translation.en: Some of my co-workers think I'm crazy, but, you know, that's who I am.
translation.zh: 我同事认为我疯了但我就是这样的人

translation.en: I continue to go down.
translation.zh: 我继续往下爬

translation.en: I finally got down to the bottom of the first floor,
translation.zh: 终于下到了一层

translation.en: and I heard two people, they were talking, and one was Sérgio,
translation.zh: 我听到两个人的声音其中一个是塞尔吉奥

translation.en: he was to the left of me and Gil was more or less straight right in front of me.
translation.zh: 他在我左手边 吉尔在我正前方

translation.en: He was conscious, he knew what was going on,
translation.zh: 他神智清醒 知道周围的情况

translation.en: he knew what happened, he knew where he was.
translation.zh: 知道发生了什么事也知道自己在哪儿

translation.en: Uh, he knew his name, he knew how old he was and where he was from.
translation.zh: 他知道自己的名字 年龄和家乡

translation.en: Uh, and he told me he was from Oxford, England.
translation.zh: 他告诉我 他的家乡是英国牛津

translation.en: He was an American working there.
translation.zh: 他是美国人 在这里工作

translation.en: I'm told that I was conscious for most of that time,
translation.zh: 他们说 我大部分时间是清醒的

translation.en: but I don't remember.
translation.zh: 但我不记得

translation.en: [Valentine] I told him, "I'm gonna continue to work while you talk."
translation.zh: 我告诉他：“你继续说 我继续挖”

translation.en: He was telling me about his family, his wife and his two lovely daughters.
translation.zh: 他对我讲他的家人 他的妻子和两个可爱的女儿

translation.en: I said, "This is my promise to you...
translation.zh: 我说：“我向你保证…

translation.en: I will get you out of here alive if you stay with me."
translation.zh: 你保持清醒 我一定把你救出来”

translation.en: The earth was smoldering.
translation.zh: 地面滚烫

translation.en: We were digging with our bare hands.
translation.zh: 我们徒手挖

translation.en: We had no shovels or equipment.
translation.zh: 没有铁锹 没有工具

translation.en: We kept calling Sérgio's name over and over.
translation.zh: 我们不停地叫着塞尔吉奥的名字

translation.en: [Davie in English] My memory was of dirt.
translation.zh: 我记得有好多土

translation.en: I was surprised about how much dirt there was.
translation.zh: 我很吃惊 居然有那么多土

translation.en: I remember thinking I'm going to move a piece of rubble and he will be there.
translation.zh: 记得我当时想 搬开一块瓦砾说不定就能找到他

translation.en: I then saw a slit.
translation.zh: 我发现一道缝隙

translation.en: I put my head in and called out again, and it was Sérgio.
translation.zh: 我探头进去 再次呼喊塞尔吉奥就在下面

translation.en: I just felt wonderful, you know.
translation.zh: 我喜出望外

translation.en: He was alive, and, uh, and we'd found him.
translation.zh: 他还活着 我们找到他了

translation.en: [Salamé] We found a hole through which we were communicating.
translation.zh: 我们发现一个洞口 通过这个洞口我们可以交流

translation.en: "Sérgio! Sérgio!"
translation.zh: “塞尔吉奥！塞尔吉奥！”

translation.en: In French... [speaks French]
translation.zh: 我们用法语说

translation.en: "We will come and help you. Don't worry."
translation.zh: “我们来救你 别担心”

translation.en: His first questions of me after I'd asked of him,
translation.zh: 问过他的情况后 他的第一个问题

translation.en: were concern for others in the team,
translation.zh: 是问其他人的情况

translation.en: not of himself or of his circumstances.
translation.zh: 不是问他自己

translation.en: "Where is Carolina? Where are the others? Please look for them."
translation.zh: “卡罗丽娜在哪儿？其他人呢？请你们去找找”

translation.en: Um, "Don't stop."
translation.zh: “别停”

translation.en: [William] I was not aware that there were people still working outside of the base
translation.zh: 我不知道 洞外面还有人在设法救援

translation.en: of the opening. I didn't hear anybody.
translation.zh: 我没听见有人

translation.en: At this point I was able to yell out one of my sergeants.
translation.zh: 这时 我喊我的一个士官

translation.en: I said, "Robbie, I need a rope.
translation.zh: 我说：“罗比 我需要一条绳子

translation.en: I need something to haul this stuff out, I need lights."
translation.zh: 我需要有东西把这些拉出去我还需要照明

translation.en: I never saw any equipment, because he was a buck sergeant and as he came through,
translation.zh: 我到底也没拿到工具因为他是个新兵 等他赶来

translation.en: now as more and more people were showing up from the army,
translation.zh: 军方更多人也来了

translation.en: higher ranking, it was like, "Hey, we need that rope."
translation.zh: 军衔更高 我们说：“我们需要这条绳子”

translation.en: You know, Captain would say "Give me the rope," and he'd say,
translation.zh: 上尉说“把绳子给我” 他说：

translation.en: "Well, I need it for my first sergeant.
translation.zh: “我的军士长要用”

translation.en: I'm a captain, give me the rope."
translation.zh: “我是上尉 把绳子给我”

translation.en: You know, "I need it and I'm a colonel, give me..."
translation.zh: “我是上校 我需要绳子 给我…”

translation.en: Never got any of that stuff.
translation.zh: 到底也没拿到绳子

translation.en: At that point both of them were lucid, conscious.
translation.zh: 这时候 他们俩都神智清醒

translation.en: I'm just trying to keep them talking.
translation.zh: 我努力让他们不停地讲话

translation.en: What I was taught was to get their minds off their injuries.
translation.zh: 我受到的训练是不要让他们想着自己的伤

translation.zh: 如果忍不住 就告诉我 我就停下来

translation.zh: 再给你些止疼药”

translation.zh: 我开始锯他的第一条腿

translation.zh: 我尽量不让他的惨叫声干扰

translation.zh: 因为我知道我必须这样做

translation.zh: 基本只对痛觉有反应

translation.zh: 但那仍然很惨烈

translation.zh: 这反倒是好事

translation.zh: 我开始锯第二条腿 他又醒了过来

translation.zh: 他开始呻吟 他说：“安德烈我能感觉到

translation.zh: 但你锯吧 速战速决”

translation.zh: 我锯完了 第二条腿也锯断了

translation.zh: 我又紧了紧止血带 然后包扎

translation.zh: 我们终于搞到一副斯凯德担架

translation.zh: 上面的人就等我说好了 就往上拉

translation.zh: 他们拉啊 拉啊

translation.zh: 那根钢筋挡住了部分洞口

translation.zh: 另一部分又被一具尸体遮挡

translation.zh: 要把吉尔拉上来 唯一的办法

translation.zh: 就是搬开那具被废墟

translation.zh: 我承担了这个没人想干的任务用我的战刀

translation.zh: 把尸体切成两段 以便他们搬运

translation.zh: 你要是认为锯腿很难…

translation.zh: 虽然那个人已经死了…

translation.zh: 也还是难下手

translation.zh: 他们终于把吉尔拉上去了

translation.zh: 我看着他说：“吉尔 你脱险了你回家了

translation.zh: 我把你交给其他人他们会送你去医院”

translation.en: [Loescher] My family was my anchor.
translation.zh: 我的家人是我的支柱

translation.en: I probably knew instinctively that if I got out of there...
translation.zh: 我可能本能地知道 如果我能出来…

translation.en: that they would, uh...
translation.zh: 他们会…

translation.en: [sighs] see me through my recovery.
translation.zh: 陪伴我直至康复

translation.zh: 他们把他救出来时他已经奄奄一息了

translation.zh: 生命体征只有…血压是60/40

translation.en: uh, and they did a hot load
translation.zh: 他们立即把他

translation.zh: 抬上一架急救直升机 送走了

translation.zh: 我看见这个人 连忙跑过去 对他说：

translation.zh: “求你了 我需要你帮忙我需要你帮忙

translation.zh: 我的塞尔吉奥在废墟下面如果我们不把他救出来…

translation.zh: 他会死的”

translation.zh: 他对我说：“有消息了

translation.zh: 你看见那架直升机了？刚才飞走的那架黑色直升机？”

translation.zh: 我说：“看见了”

translation.zh: “刚飞过去的那架 他可能…

translation.zh: 就在飞机上 但我有不幸的消息

translation.en: and you have to be strong.
translation.zh: 你要坚强

translation.en: To free him out we had to cut his legs
translation.zh: 为了把他抬出来我们只好锯断他的腿

translation.zh: 他的情况很糟糕

translation.zh: 一只胳膊也受了重伤”

translation.zh: 我说：”好 没关系 他还活着吧？

translation.zh: 我不在乎他的腿 他还活着吧？”

translation.zh: “是的”

translation.zh: 他的意识开始模糊 不怎么说话了

translation.en: He was... You could hear his breathing was a lot more erratic
translation.zh: 你可以听到 他的呼吸更加紊乱

translation.zh: 更不规律

translation.zh: 我过去 继续鼓励他

translation.en: I tried to, uh, hold his hand,
translation.zh: 我尝试握住他的手

translation.en: and you know, lay next to him and put my head on him,
translation.zh: 躺在他身旁 头枕在他身上

translation.en: uh, so he'll know that somebody was there.
translation.zh: 让他知道有人陪着他

translation.zh: 我回去告诉塞尔吉奥 说我们接下来会救他出来

translation.zh: 他没回应 我摇晃他 还是没反应

translation.zh: 我摸他的脉搏 没有脉搏了

translation.zh: 我们不能救他出来了 那感觉好像被一吨重的砖头砸中一样

translation.zh: 我想死

translation.zh: 而他辜负了我们

translation.zh: 我生他的气 但我也为他感到痛苦

translation.zh: 因为他不相信我 他不相信奇迹

translation.zh: 我们只是要他坚持住别放弃活下去的意志

translation.zh: 要有信心 而他不想那么做

translation.zh: 别管我 先救其他人吧

translation.zh: 所以我只好说谎

translation.zh: 是的 没错 现在

translation.zh: 我的好朋友塞尔吉奥还在里面

translation.zh: 他很可能是这次袭击的目标

translation.zh: 关于他们的救援 让我震惊的是

translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥在废墟底下埋了三个半小时都救不出来

translation.zh: 他们只有一只女式手包和一段窗帘绳子？

translation.zh: 开玩笑吧？

translation.zh: 这是美国啊

translation.zh: 那些策划了这场战争的政客

translation.zh: 他们不仅对不起塞尔吉奥和其他在那次袭击中丧生的人

translation.zh: 也对不起那些出生入死的军人

translation.zh: 可怕 可怕

translation.zh: 在废墟里 他躺在他的旗子上

translation.zh: 联合国的旗帜

translation.zh: 慢慢地 一点一点地

translation.zh: 抬来担架

translation.zh: 我们把他放在担架上

translation.zh: 结果就是这样”

translation.zh: 无法理解

translation.zh: 我们站在二楼 尸体被抬上来

translation.zh: 被放在…

translation.en: [exhales deeply] on a...
translation.zh: 放在…

translation.zh: 我认出了他 他的脸…

translation.zh: 一点没有伤到

translation.zh: 还是那么英俊

translation.zh: 她还不知道

translation.zh: 她什么都不知道

translation.zh: 所以我尽量克制住自己

translation.zh: 回到卧室 哭了一会儿

translation.zh: 然后冷静下来 把这消息告诉她

translation.zh: 有一个这样的儿子

translation.zh: 有这么优秀的品质

translation.zh: 结果却是这样

translation.zh: 我太想他了

translation.zh: 我不能说已经走出来了

translation.zh: 但我在朝前走

translation.zh: 我经常去安葬塞尔吉奥的

translation.zh: 国王公墓

translation.zh: 和他说会儿话

translation.zh: 现在他魂归天国

translation.zh: 但我真的无法原谅害死了他的那些人

translation.zh: 他那种置个人安危于度外的态度给我印象深刻

translation.zh: 根本不问自己 只问别人的安危

translation.zh: 从不为自己要求什么 包括止疼药

translation.zh: 他总是说：“救其他人吧”

translation.zh: 我觉得应该让人们知道

translation.en: I didn't know who to contact, I didn't know where he was from.
translation.zh: 我不知道该联系谁不知道他是哪里来的

translation.en: I just knew his boss was Kofi Annan.
translation.zh: 我只知道他的上司是科菲安南

translation.en: So that night on my broken and battered laptop computer,
translation.zh: 那天晚上 我用我破烂的笔记本电脑

translation.en: I wrote a letter to Kofi Annan.
translation.zh: 给科菲安南写了封信

translation.en: 19th August, 2003.
[sniffles] You know, I'm not gonna get through this.
translation.zh: 你知道 我念不下去

translation.en: "Subject: Sérgio Vieira de Mello.
translation.zh: 标题：塞尔吉奥德梅洛

translation.en: As you are painfully aware, at approximately 1630 today local time,
translation.zh: 想必您已惊闻这个噩耗当地时间大约下午四点半

translation.en: a horrible disaster occurred
translation.zh: 联合国驻巴格达总部

translation.en: [voice breaks] at the UN headquarters in Baghdad.
translation.zh: 发生了可怕的灾难

translation.en: I was the first US soldier to arrive on the scene, and the sight was catastrophic.
translation.zh: 我是第一个赶到现场的美国士兵那场面惨不忍睹

translation.en: Unfortunately, Mr. de Mello passed away.
translation.zh: 德梅洛先生不幸逝世

translation.en: While there is no good way to die, it says a lot about a man's character
translation.zh: 无论哪种死法 终究都是悲剧但一个人临死前

translation.en: when his last thoughts are for his family, his co-workers,
translation.zh: 想的全是家人、同事、他的祖国

translation.en: and his country, or in this case, the UN.
translation.zh: 或者联合国 这足以看出他的品质

translation.en: I'm truly sorry we could not
translation.zh: 我们没能兑现诺言

translation.en: have kept our promise to get him out alive.
translation.zh: 救他出来 我感到深深的遗憾

translation.en: The UN is fortunate to have people of this caliber working for them.
translation.zh: 联合国有这样的人为它效力是幸运的

translation.en: I salute all of them
translation.zh: 我向他们这样的人致敬

translation.en: and hope that your mission in Iraq will conclude successfully.
translation.zh: 希望您在伊拉克的工作圆满成功

translation.en: Mr. de Mello was a humanitarian of the first order.
translation.zh: 德梅洛先生是最优秀的人道主义者

translation.en: He will be hard to be replaced."
translation.zh: 很难有人能取代他的位置

translation.en: [Kofi Annan] Today we share our shock and sorrow
translation.zh: 失去了我们所爱的人

translation.en: at the loss of people we loved.
translation.zh: 我们都感到震惊和悲痛

translation.en: All of them leave a huge void.
translation.zh: 他们留下了一个巨大的空洞

translation.en: Raid, Leen, Ihsan, Emaad, and Basim,
translation.zh: 雷德、林、伊山、以玛德、巴西姆

translation.en: Rahim, Ranillo, Rick, Reza,
translation.zh: 拉希姆、拉尼罗、里克、里萨

translation.en: Jean-Sélim, Christopher, Martha,
translation.zh: 让塞林 克里斯托弗、玛莎

translation.en: Fiona, Nadia,
translation.zh: 菲欧纳、娜迪亚

translation.en: finally, Sérgio, my dear friend.
translation.zh: 最后 我亲爱的朋友 塞尔吉奥

translation.en: Why did you never seem tired
translation.zh: 为什么你好像永不疲倦

translation.en: while even working 18-hour days?
translation.zh: 哪怕每天工作18个小时？

translation.en: Why did you never look crumpled
translation.zh: 为什么你总是精神饱满

translation.en: even after an 18-hour flight?
translation.zh: 哪怕连续飞行18小时？

translation.en: Why were you never sick?
translation.zh: 为什么你从不生病？

translation.en: Why were you never grumpy?
translation.zh: 为什么你从不抱怨？

translation.en: And you were the only top official in the UN known to everyone
translation.zh: 你还是联合国唯一一个大家都能

translation.en: by his first name.
translation.zh: 直呼其名的高级官员

translation.en: Even to those who didn't know you personally
translation.zh: 哪怕对于那些并不认识你的人

translation.en: you were always just Sérgio.
translation.zh: 你也永远只是塞尔吉奥

translation.en: [Power] It is heartening that around the world,
translation.zh: 世界各地 不管是联合国项目中

translation.en: whether in the United Nations missions
translation.zh: 还是人道主义机构中 或是政府里

translation.en: or in humanitarian organizations or in governments,
translation.zh: 的确有人会自问

translation.en: you do have individuals who ask themselves
translation.zh: 如果是塞尔吉奥 他会怎么做

translation.en: what would Sérgio do.
translation.zh: 这是令人鼓舞的

translation.en: The one answer that they know he would give is,
translation.zh: 他们知道 他一定会说

translation.en: "Get out of the capital and go out into the world
translation.zh: “走出政治中心 走进外面的世界

translation.en: and figure out what's happening.
translation.zh: 了解一下究竟是怎么回事

translation.en: Figure out what's making people tick.
translation.zh: 了解人们的真实诉求

translation.en: Respect the dignity of the human beings whose lives are at stake here.
translation.zh: 尊重人的尊严你的工作关乎他们的生命

translation.en: Don't treat them as a model if there is a mass.
translation.zh: 不要把他们当作一个模型一个抽象群体

translation.en: Engage the bad guys.
translation.zh: 与恶人打交道

translation.en: Be a man of action,
translation.zh: 做个行动的人

translation.en: but also never stop being a man of reflection."
translation.zh: 但也不要停止反思”

translation.en: [Larriera] I wish I could have an elastic time.
translation.zh: 我希望时间是有弹性的

translation.en: To be able to go back to the past and stretch out some special moments
translation.zh: 让我能回到过去把一些特殊的瞬间拉长

translation.en: to a maximum.
translation.zh: 无限拉长

translation.en: Now we know where that, uh, those times are finished and, uh...
translation.zh: 现在 我们知道那些瞬间结束在哪里

translation.en: and... they won't happen again.
translation.zh: 不会再有了

translation.en: When I finally made it back to Brazil, I went to this spot.
translation.zh: 我终于回到了巴西 去了这个地方

translation.en: The spot where we will always arrive
translation.zh: 这个我们每次回巴西

translation.en: every time we would hit the ground in Brazil,
translation.zh: 都会第一时间

translation.en: and go straight into the water at the sea.
translation.zh: 跑向海滩 跳进海里的地方

translation.en: I really felt the strength of his spirit and the kindness of his spirit
translation.zh: 我觉得 他的精神的力量他的精神的善良

translation.en: were right there.
translation.zh: 就在那儿

translation.en: That's where I feel that... that Sérgio is now.
translation.zh: 我觉得塞尔吉奥现在就在那里

translation.en: And where I feel that, uh, he really, really rests forever.
translation.zh: 我觉得那是他永远长眠的地方

translation.en: [Sérgio] My message is very simple.
translation.zh: 我要说的话很简单：

translation.en: Never forget that the real challenges
translation.zh: 永远不要忘了 服务于联合国

translation.en: and the real rewards of serving the United Nations
translation.zh: 真正的挑战和真正的回报

translation.en: are out there in the field,
translation.zh: 都是在第一线

translation.en: where people are suffering, where people need you.
translation.zh: 在有人受苦受难 需要你帮助的地方

translation.en: So, good luck. Welcome to the organization,
translation.zh: 所以祝你们好运 欢迎加入这个组织

translation.en: and here we are to help you in any way we can.
translation.zh: 我们会竭尽所能帮助你们

translation.en: All the best.
translation.zh: 祝你们万事如意

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好
